name: jesse wilkins
text: Nice place.. Only place I've seen in mobile that has a wide variety of inventory of communications equipment.. DOWNSIDE IS THEY DO NOT SELL TO THE PUBLIC..

name: Bryan Chambers
text: Awesome people and always friendly and willing to help in any way,  as a local home security business owner . Cerberus home security llc in elberta AL is proud to do business with ADI

name: alarmrat
text: Always helpful and quick. Good location

name: Jimmy Moore
text: Always a pleasure doing business here.  The staff are very personable and friendly.  They are our vendor of choice for most of the materials we need.
